hideArrows.description: If `true`, hide arrow buttons near the date label

onViewChange.description: Callback triggered when the Calendar view (the displayed month) is changed

fromToday.description: If `false`, prevent the user to select a date lower than today date

dayLabel.description: Show/hide actual day label on top of the calendar

labelClassName.description: Custom className applied on the day label component

labelProps.description: Custom props applied on the day label component

onChange.description: Callback triggered when Calendar component input value is changed by the user
